attributes.additional_details: By legalising e-scooters it will help hundreds of people to be able to travel to work in a cleaner faster way then walking or using public transport due to covid 19 i think legalising e-scooters would have a huge benefit and help prevent people using public transport or even car sharing to work
attributes.background: Legalising e-scooters so that people who dont have other means of transportation can still get to work. I am a key worker who finds it extremely hard to get to work but since having an e-scooter its found to be easier
